comments.comment: What do you think churro morales ?
I can take a look and see what is going on
Do you get this issue when the entire ZK cluster is down? Or only when you hit certain hosts?
I think it was for all zookeeper down. To test I gave a conf which did not have zookeeper running.
If Zookeeper is down, then HBase is down. So no need for a canary in that case.

This is for Zookeeper Canary. So even if HBase is down.. ZK Canary should work as it is. Secondly the issue if zookeeper Canary fails it should return non-zero exit code where as in this situation it is returning exit code to be 0
